name: Roboventure (TheGreatKida, leocss, Magilou Provence, K4YT0, Luckie95, VuZeRevil)
name_original: Roboventure (TheGreatKida, leocss, Magilou Provence, K4YT0, Luckie95, VuZeRevil)
description:
The world as we known was filled with waste, rubbish and everything humans didnt want anymore. You are playing Robert the robot, who broke into a scrapyard. Now you want to collect some old robot parts to "repair yourself." Robert has a squicky left leg and his left arm is hanging on for dear life. Maybe you can help him to "repair himself."

How to play: What do you get in this game:
  • selfmade 3D assets
  • selfmade 3D Animations
  • selfmade Pixel Graphics
  • random spawning collectables, so you have fun searching a second time ;)
  • ui where you can see which robot part you collected
  • ui that tells you how many robot parts you have
  • a main character with character
  • selfmade music 
  • a gameworld with story
Made By:

TheGreatKida (Tosca) - Itchio Page/ Pixel Graphics

Magilou Provence (Dennis) - 3D Modeling

K4YT0 (Pascal) - Coding/ 3D Modeling

Luckie95 (Luca) - Sounds Design (Music and Sounds)

Leocss (Leonie) - Pixel Graphics/ Ui Design

VuZeRevil (David) - Ui Design cutting/ Cursor

Made as a Projekt for the htk academy GameJam Ice Edition 2022 with the theme "You are the enemy."
